::KitKat::

She turned and glared at Testifier. "STAND DOWN AND I MEAN NOW!"
She was enraged at his yeling at her in that manner.  She walked 
towards Testifier, growling. "Do you know what those sick, blood 
thirsty maximals would have done to her had I done what I did? Thye 
would have put her through the worst kind of torture ever thought of, 
just for fun.  They would had made her suffer unspeakable pain and 
misery and then let her die a slow death.  I did her a favor and 
ended it before they could have hurt her any more.  You take about 
pain, I know pain.  Every time I close my eyes, I see her.  She 
haunts my dreams and my mind every waking moment.  No matter what, I 
have to live with this pain for the rest of my life."  

She was angry  and almost to the brink of tears. She growled and 
yelled at Testifier.

"I did what I had to do because she was my friend.  Because I cared, 
I did what I had to do.  I cared enough to save her pain and 
suffering at the hands of our enemy.  And if you can't understand 
that, then tothe pit with you."

Stood there for a moment looking at Testifier with pain and hurt in 
her eyes.  Just before she broke down, she transformed into wolf mode 
and ran out of the base.  She ran through the forest, trying to out 
run her pain. 
  



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Tesifier gets up, charging towards Drill Bit and KitKat. He pointed 
at KitKat.
> 
> "SHUT UP! You and your boyfriend, always so much I love you and 
stuff, well you know what happened to my only friend? my sister, the 
one you call Land Mine? She's dead! Who killed her? You! And you rub 
it in my face! What kind of friends are you?" Tesifier fell into a 
lean on the wall...
